author: stefan2
msg: Some FSX code cleanup and stream handling fixes.
The stream handling issue lies in the difference between the delta
stream being created and the raw output stream. We checksum the input
into the delta stream and close it once the delta is complete. After
that, we add the "ENDREP" sequence to the raw stream.  This did not
surface as an error before since writing to a closed file stream is
not being prevented.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_x/transaction.c
(rep_write_contents): Get rid of FSFS remnants as we always write
deltififed data.
(rep_write_get_baton): Don't close the output stream automatically
because we need to add the footer after the
plaintext has already been fully deltified.
(rep_write_contents_close): Again, we always deltify in FSX.  Also,
we now need to close the raw stream explicitly.
(write_container_delta_rep): Close the raw rep stream explicitly.
(write_final_changed_path_info): Update function docstring.

author: stefan2
msg: Sync'ing FSX with FSFS:
Make FSX indexes precisely track the rev / pack file size such
added data is always detected even if the block sizes change.
This does not merge specific revisions.
* index.c
(p2l_header_t): Add member for rev / pack file size.
(svn_fs_x__p2l_index_create): Store the original file size
in our index file.
(get_p2l_header): Load that info again.
(p2l_get_max_offset_func,
svn_fs_x__p2l_get_max_offset): Use the precise file size
instead of a multiple of the block size.

author: hboutemy
msg: [MSHARED-336] fixed typo

author: mattsicker
msg: Safely close JNDI Context.

author: stefan2
msg: Sync'ing FSX with FSFS:
Porting documentation and iterpool usage improvments.
There are no specific revision that were merged by this.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_x/index.c
(encode_uint,
encode_int,
encode_l2p_page,
l2p_page_table_access_func,
get_l2p_page_table): Update function docstring.
(prefetch_l2p_pages): Ditto. Also, clear iterpools at loop start.
(l2p_index_lookup): Clear iterpools at loop start.
(svn_fs_x__l2p_get_max_ids): Update commentary.
(svn_fs_x__p2l_index_create): Same and clear iterpools at loop start.
